Rewind
Offensive player
of the week
Josh Avila , Somerset: running back, senior — Rushed for 290 yards and three touchdowns in a 23-16 victory against rival Southside . Scored on a pair of 75-yard runs and had a game-winning 34-yard TD run with 1:27 left.
Defensive player
of the week
Devontre McGarity, Brennan: defensive back, senior — Recorded two interceptions in the Bears’ 42-10 win over Warren in District 27-6A Zone A play. Returned one of those picks for an 85-yard touchdown.
Game balls
 Taft senior running back Christian Mallard racked up 235 yards and three touchdowns on 15 carries to help the Raiders rout Jay 42-7.
 Clemens junior quarterback Frank Harris rushed for 151 yards and two scores to rally the Buffaloes to a a 20-17 victory against New Braunfels Canyon.
 McCollum running back Mike Ramirez compiled 236 yards and four touchdowns on 25 carries in the Cowboys’ 48-28 win over Jefferson.
To nominate players of the week for football/volleyball, email bbaby@express-news.net or tthomas@express-news.net.
